name: Where are these cities? Quiz | Our World for Kids | 10 Questions

questions.text: Amiens, Avignon, Rouen and Orleans are all major cities in which European country?
questions.explanation:
France.

	These cities are all in France. Paris is the capital. Other major cities include Strasbourg, Bordeaux, Dijon, Toulouse and Lyon.

questions.text: In which African country can you visit Durban, Port Elizabeth, Rustenburg and Kimberley?
questions.explanation:
South Africa.

	South Africa is the only country with three national capitals - Pretoria is the executive capital, Bloemfontein the judicial capital, and Cape Town the legislative capital.

questions.text: In which country in the Americas will you find the cities Halifax, Fredericton, Regina and Charlottetown?
questions.explanation:
Canada.

	Those listed are all capitals of Canadian provinces or territories. Ottawa is the national capital of Canada. Other provincial capitals include Edmonton, Toronto, Quebec City, Victoria and Winnipeg.

questions.text: Fukuoka, Hiroshima, Chiba and Kumamoto are all cities in which Asian country?
questions.explanation:
Japan.

	All of these cities house more than 750,000 inhabitants. Indeed, there are around a dozen Japanese cities that are home to more than one million people. The largest is the national capital, Tokyo. Other major cities include Yokohama, Osaka, Kobe, Sapporo and Kyoto.

questions.text: In which Oceanic country are these cities all regional capitals: Hamilton, Gisborne, Nelson and Invercargill?
questions.explanation:
New Zealand.

	The national capital of New Zealand is Wellington, the southernmost capital city in the world. Other major cities include Dunedin, Auckland and Christchurch.

questions.text: Eisenstadt, Klagenfurt, Sankt Pölten and Graz are all regional capital cities in which European country?
questions.explanation:
Austria.

	Vienna is both the largest city and the capital of Austria. Other major cities include Salzburg, Innsbruck and Linz.

questions.text: Salé, Fes, Agadir, Meknes and Oujda are major cities in which African country?
questions.explanation:
Morocco.

	Although Rabat in the national capital of Morocco, Casablanca is the largest city. Other major cities include Tangier, Marrakesh and Tetouan.

questions.text: Guadalajara, Chihuahua, Morelia and Culiacán are all state capitals in which country of the Americas?
questions.explanation:
Mexico.

	Mexico City is the capital and largest city in Mexico. Other major cities include Mérida, Veracruz, Leon and Cancún.

questions.text: In which Asian country can you visit these cities of more than one million inhabitants: Surabaya, Medan, Batam and Makassar?
questions.explanation:
Indonesia.

	With a population approaching 10 million, Jakarta is both the capital and the largest city in Indonesia. A dozen Indonesian cities are home to more than one million people including Bandung, Bekasi, Tangerang, Depok and Semarang.

questions.text: Mashhad, Esfahân, Tabriz, Karaj and Shiraz are all cities of more than one million people in which country in the Middle East?
questions.explanation:
Iran.

	Home to more than 7.5 million people, Tehran is both the capital and the largest city in Iran. Mashhad is the country's second-largest city, with more than 2.4 million inhabitants. It is also one of the holiest Shi'a cities in the world.
